name: Aim Training (NaruChann)
description:
This game was made for the University of Europe for Applied Science in Berlin with instruction from Professor Csongor Baranyai by Naru. 

INSTRUCTIONS:

Red targets are the base ones, shoot them and you'll get your point.

Blue targets have to be shot twice and you get points by each shot.

Yellow targets when shot for the first time they'll multiply and become four reds.

Critical Shots is the name of the shots you hit at the center of each target, giving extra points.

This game is a part of the game-a-week course with the theme of "Find & Click".
